page.title: 10Village Life, Prickwillow
page.content: When{Mr.Jakes}was asked for his personal view, this was his answer. 'It is a quieter, more intimate type of life. You know virtualy everyone in the Village and they know you. You can speak to everyone you meet. If you want{Entertainment}such as going to the Cinema or Restaurant then you have to travel, to Ely or even Cambridge. I work in Cambridge (Cambridge Library) and only two others in the Village commute that far. The majority tend to work in or near the Village such as Littleport, Ely or Soham'.
